A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Many of the low star reviews of of this movie are here to air grievances about how this movie treats various fan theories. Too bad. The truth is that this is an incredibly well-constructed film that is constantly moving forward and hardly allows you to feel the 2 and a half hour run time. There are 3 main plot threads: Rey's story\, Poe's story\, and Finn's story. They all move in tandem and the movie flips between them pretty seamlessly. By the time they all fail in their various tasks/goals\, then they fail HARDER\, you really get the point that Yoda was espousing: failure is a great teacher. These threads don't lead to great heartwarming success for the Resistance because they can't - this is the middle movie\, not the finale. But all of the characters grow\, change\, and learn.
